args.sql: SELECT * FROM mofs WHERE database = 'Tobacco' AND surface_area_m2g BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY surface_area_m2g DESC
SELECT DISTINCT m.name, m.database FROM mofs m JOIN elements e ON m.id = e.mof_id WHERE e.element_symbol = 'Cu' AND m.n_atom < 100
SELECT database, COUNT(*) as count FROM mofs GROUP BY database
SELECT name, lcd, pld FROM mofs WHERE lcd > 10 AND pld > 5 LIMIT 5
SELECT m.name, i.temperature FROM mofs m JOIN isotherms i ON m.id = i.mof_id WHERE i.temperature = 298
SELECT name, void_fraction FROM mofs WHERE void_fraction > 0.8
SELECT a.name, COUNT(*) as count FROM adsorbates a JOIN mof_adsorbates ma ON a.id = ma.adsorbate_id GROUP BY a.name
SELECT name FROM mofs WHERE surface_area_m2cm3 > 2000
WITH avg_sa AS (SELECT AVG(surface_area_m2g) as val FROM mofs) SELECT name, surface_area_m2g FROM mofs, avg_sa WHERE surface_area_m2g > avg_sa.val LIMIT 5
